name: Mahalo Privacy Policy
body:
### Summary
The Mahalo app transfers data to and from the [Twitch](https://www.twitch.tv/) video platform. It may transfer technical information about a user's system to Hockeyapp and Microsoft for the purposes of error reporting and app analytics.

### Third-party services
* Mahalo is a client for the [Twitch](https://www.twitch.tv/) video platform, and so may transfer information to and from the Twitch service. The Twitch privacy policy is available here: https://www.twitch.tv/p/privacy-policy
* Mahalo uses [Hockeyapp](https://www.hockeyapp.net/) to collect crash logs. Crash logs are automatically uploaded if the app crashes, and include the model of your device and your OS version. The Hockeyapp privacy policy is available here: https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-us/privacystatement
* Microsoft may provide Mahalo with Error Reporting and App Analytics data. This data is subject to the App Developer Agreement, Section 9. https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/apps/hh694058.aspx
